textBox.richText: The picture above is the new addition to our classroom - a binary clock! For years, you could get a small binary clock to sit on your desk, but nobody made a large binary clock that was suitable for hanging in a classroom.  Now, they ARE available, and on sale at thinkgeek.com, so I couldn’t resist :-) Below is a picture that describes how to read the time on it. I think binary stuff will really catch on.  Soon we will see microwave ovens with binary touch pads as well as binary thermostats.  That way, you could say things like “Hey dear, could you turn the heat up a bit?”
